coreAttributes.name: striped gloves
coreAttributes.description: A pair of long, fingerless gloves, which are made out of soft wool. Their most notable feature is the looping pattern of colourful stripes that they're decorated with.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the gloves over [npc.her] [npc.hands], before pulling them up to [npc.her] elbows.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the gloves over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.hands], before pulling them up to [npc2.her] elbows.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the gloves onto [npc2.namePos] [npc2.hands], before yanking them up to [npc2.her] elbows.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the gloves down from [npc.her] elbows, before pulling them free from [npc.her] [npc.hands].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the gloves down from [npc2.namePos] elbows, before pulling them free from [npc2.her] [npc2.hands].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] the gloves down from [npc2.namePos] elbows, before roughly pulling them free from [npc2.her] [npc2.hands].
